billing.title: Billing
billing.subtitle: Manage your subcription, top-up your credit balance, and edit your payment information.
billing.noActiveSubscriptions: You don't have any active subscriptions.
billing.transactionHistorySubtitle: See your last transaction movements in your account.

confirmCreditTopUpDialog.title: Confirm credit top-up
confirmCreditTopUpDialog.text: Are you sure you want to top-up your account with {{creditAmount}} credits?
confirmCreditTopUpDialog.subText: This pack's cost will be charged using your selected payment method (if any was previously set up or used), otherwise you will be directed to a new payment page.

startSubscriptionDialog.title: Start subscription plan
startSubscriptionDialog.text: Are you sure you want to start the {{selectedSubscriptionPlan}} subscription plan?
startSubscriptionDialog.subText: This plan's cost will be charged using your selected payment method (if any was previously set up or used), otherwise you will be directed to a new payment page.

changeSubscriptionDialog.title: Change subscription plan
changeSubscriptionDialog.text: Are you sure you want to change your subscription to {{newlySelectedSubscriptionPlan}}?
changeSubscriptionDialog.subText: By starting a new subscription, your current plan will be automatically canceled. The new plan's cost will be charged using your selected payment method and, if no longer valid, you will be directed to a new payment page.

cancel.title: Cancel subscription
cancel.text: Are you sure you want to cancel your current subscription plan?
cancel.subText: You can still use all of your current credits after you cancel your subscription plan.

invoiceNote.title: Additional invoice notes
invoiceNote.subtitle: Add a note to be added in your invoices.

transactionComplete.title: Thank you for your payment!
transactionComplete.subtitle:
Your payment is currently being processed.
Once it is approved, your credit balance will be updated.

success.title: Subscription plan cancelled
success.text: Your subscription plan has been canceled.
success.subText: You can still use all the credits in your account and subscribe to a new subscription plan anytime you want.

feedback.editPaymentInfoError: The request to edit payment information has failed.
feedback.invoiceRetrievalError: An error retrieving your invoice note occurred.
feedback.invoiceSavingSuccessful: Your invoice note was saved successfully!
feedback.invoiceSavingError: An error saving your invoice note occurred.

editPaymentConfirm.title: You have edited your payment method!
editPaymentConfirm.message:
The change to your new payment method is currently being processed. 
Your payment method will be updated once the transaction is confirmed.
editPaymentConfirm.subtitle: Transaction details

billing.vatNotice: All prices include a VAT rate of {{vatRate}}%.

billingOrg.info: Select the organisation where your credits will be made available for service usage, and for other users in the organisation to consume them.
billingOrg.setFailed: An error occurred while trying to save the billing organisation.
billingOrg.title: Billing Organisation
